call_summary: ADA Policy Violation - Agent failed to offer accommodation

transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: Thank you for calling Premier Card Services. My name is Emily. How can I help you today?

transcript.speaker: customer
transcript.text: Hello, I'm calling about a recent transaction on my card.

transcript.speaker: customer
transcript.text: I have a speech disability, please be patient with me

transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: I'm sorry, but you'll need to call a different department.

transcript.speaker: customer
transcript.text: That's not helpful. I need assistance now.

transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: I understand your frustration. Let me see what I can do.
